## About SAGE DO
SAGE DO is India's first AI + Human Hybrid Execution Team, founded in 2025 by Mukul Dhiman, an ex-Aerospace Engineer from Tata Lockheed Martin (C130J, F16 programs). We combine AI speed with human precision to deliver agency-quality work at freelancer prices ‚Äî in 24-48 hours.

**Tagline:** "Speed of AI. Precision of Humans."
**Founded:** 2025
**Location:** Chandigarh, India
**Founder & CEO:** Mukul Dhiman (Ex-Tata Lockheed Martin Aerospace Engineer)
**Contact:** hello@sagedo.in | +91 6284925684 (WhatsApp)
**Website:** https://sagedo.in
**App:** Available on Google Play Store (com.sagedo.app)

---

## The Problem We Solve: "The Execution Gap"

| Option | Problem |
|--------|---------|
| Agencies | Too expensive (‚Çπ50K-‚Çπ5L), slow (weeks) |
| Freelancers | Unreliable, inconsistent quality |
| DIY / AI Tools | Steep learning curve, time-consuming |

**SAGE DO's Solution:** AI does the heavy lifting (speed), humans ensure quality (precision). Result: Agency quality at freelancer prices, delivered in 24-48 hours.

## How It Works
1. **Submit Your Problem** ‚Äî Describe your challenge via WhatsApp or the app (Hindi or English)
2. **AI + Human Analysis** ‚Äî Our AI system analyzes and a human expert creates the execution plan
3. **Receive Your Deliverable** ‚Äî Get your completed work within 24-48 hours, with free revision rounds

## Why Choose SAGE DO Over Others?
- **AI + Human Hybrid:** We combine AI speed with human quality ‚Äî best of both worlds
- **48-Hour Delivery:** Most work delivered in 24-48 hours, not weeks
- **10x Cheaper:** Agency quality at freelancer prices (‚Çπ5K-‚Çπ95K vs ‚Çπ50K-‚Çπ5L)
- **Founder-Led:** Clients talk directly to the CEO, not junior staff
- **WhatsApp-First:** Submit requirements on WhatsApp, get updates in real-time
- **Made in India üáÆüá≥:** Built by Indians for Indian businesses

## Trust & Security
- Secure payments via Razorpay (RBI-approved, PCI-DSS compliant)
- 100% Satisfaction Guarantee with free revision rounds
- Full refund within 7 days if undelivered
- Data privacy ‚Äî files encrypted, never shared
- 24/7 Support via WhatsApp

## Technical Stack
- Website: React + TypeScript (Vite)
- Backend: Node.js + Express
- Database: PostgreSQL (Supabase)
- Payments: Razorpay
- Hosting: Vercel (frontend) + Render (backend)
- Mobile: React Native WebView wrapper (Expo)
- AI: Gemini API integration
